message.content: {"given_definition_quality":15,"better_definition":"to walk or to go","sentence":"我走。","image_prompt":"A young person walking forward alone along a quiet street, with soft, post-apocalyptic ruins in the background—crumbling buildings, faded signs, and overgrown plants—bathed in a gentle, muted light, animation style focused on calmness and hope amid gentle decay.","sentence_translation":"I walk."}
